Summary: silver disc shape ,flashing circular lights, motionless. no sound
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around June 15th 1965
divs: Sighting Detailsi was six years old at the time. we were in fort.thomas ky. cutting grass my mother stopped the mower and said what is that? we looked up and very low was a silver shaped disc that made no sound and just sat there it had red yellow and white lights going around it in a circular motion. we watched it for several minutes and then it just disappeared without sound or ever able to follow it i was young and did not know of ufo's but to this day i will never forget it.
